WorkItem.Description:
I want to protect whole sheet and some cells are unprotected. But When I group/outline column, it prevent collapse/expand column. 

How to use below code in php?

 Private Sub Workbook_Open()
 Dim wksht As Worksheet
For Each wksht In ThisWorkbook.Sheets
With wksht
.Unprotect
.EnableOutlining = True // unprotect group/outline cell
.Protect Contents:=True, userInterfaceOnly:=True
.Protect
 End With
Next wksht
End Sub
WorkItem.Summary: How to enable outlining/group column with sheet protection in phpexcel?
